skins.shipDescription: Type 1934-class destroyer C Z2 Georg Thiele.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Georg Thiele, otherwise known as Z2, a Type 1934 destroyer built as an experiment. I was to make quick work of adversaries using my excellent mobility, or at least that was the plan... I'd rather not elaborate. Please forget I said that.
skins.acquisition: I am Z2, Georg Thiele, awaiting your orders. However, if your orders are flawed, please allow me to reconsider them. May our relationship be productive.
skins.login: Commander, I have a question: why do you always arrive later than me?
skins.details: Commander, I have a question, do you have a thing for making others dress up in fancy clothes?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, please try not to be as reckless as Lebe. It would be annoying to have to knock you out, and I don't particularly like getting physical with a superior officer.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll bring you a fresh batch of paperwork if you have nothing better to do. I hope you're ready.
skins.secretaryIdle3: This little one is Lebe. Yes, you heard that correctly; this is Lebe. Isn't she cute?
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh, absolutely, I agree wholeheartedly. Now, what's our next task?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Among all actions that take bravery, this would, in my honest opinion, be the worst kind.
